speaker: player
dialog: IT'S MY FIRST DAY ON THE JOB, I HOPE I DON'T MESS UP!

speaker: goblin
dialog: USE THE ARROW KEYS TO MOVE AROUND THE INVENTORY

speaker: goblin
dialog: USE THE X KEY TO PICK UP AND PUT DOWN ITEMS

speaker: goblin
dialog: USE THE C KEY TO PICK UP ITEMS FROM THE INBOX ON THE RIGHT

speaker: goblin
dialog: USE THE Z KEY TO SEND AWAY ITEMS TO THE OUTBOX ON THE LEFT
